mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, BIRTH, PHONE_NUMBER) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_ID AS "memberId", M.PASSWORD AS "password", M.NICKNAME AS "nickname", M.NAME AS "name", M.GENDER AS "gender", M.EMAIL AS "email", M.BIRTH AS "birth", M.PHONE_NUMBER AS "phoneNumber", F.FILE_DATA AS "fileData" FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE F ON M.FILE_NO = F.FILE_NO WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
